reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable with pockets and appreciate its quality, with one noting it's great for maternity wear. The dress receives positive feedback for its soft fabric, nice color options, and appearance. The length and material quality receive mixed reviews - while some find the length great and the fabric thick enough, others say it's too short and the fabric is very thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy and flattering
items.body: Fabric is ultra soft. Cannot believe how comfortable this dress is. I have SUPER sensitive skin so I can't have tags in ANY of my clothing. The small tag in this dress does not irritate my skin. Left the tag on when I tried it on and couldn't even feel it. I am 5'9" and 210 lbs. I purchased a white dress in large and it fits perfect. Not too tight, not too loose. The top was a little sheer so you could see my bra. May be because the fabric sits slightly stretched when I put it on. Received compliments on it. Husband said to buy more. =) Already purchased one more in another color ... would like to purchase a few more. Can't believe how amazing comfy and cute this dress is!!!! And it has POCKETS!!!! Read more
items.author: D'Anna Nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size runs true.
items.body: Nice and stretchy, fits well. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: This dress is made of very soft material, it fits well and is comfortable. Read more
items.author: Jay Cee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: Very comfortable and pretty dress, is soft and has stretch so isn’t restricting with movement. Easy to wear and easily can dress up for an afternoon event, with enough versatility to run errands in between the day.. and has large but subtle pockets Read more
items.author: Faizah S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Christmas Dress
items.body: This dress is so cute on. I wore it with chunky black boots for a casual look, but it could easily be worn with a kitten or high heel to dress it up. I plan on wearing this for Christmas. Read more
items.author: michelle Boss

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin fabric.
items.body: I have many of these dresses and this one is just okay. I kept it because I like the pattern, but the type fabric on the top is different from the bottom. The bottom fabric is soft but much thinner than most of the ones I purchased previously where the type of fabric is the same top and bottom. Read more
items.author: LaDonna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars order a size smaller
items.body: very thin fabric but fits well and it is flattering Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect concert black dress
items.body: The size is accurate. The dress is soft and comfortable jersey. And it even has side pockets!! This is a perfect Concert Black dress, also suitable as an under dress for any colorful tunic. It machine washes , then hang dries without wrinkles. Read more
items.author: Kelliewicz

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 01-royal Blue, 02-red Flower White, 01-wine Red, 02-striped Black, 01-purple Gray, Black, 01-army Green, 02-black Green, Golden Leaf/Bk, 01-white2, 01-dark Green, 01-mauve2, Navy Leaves/Navy, 01-purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
